Room.Name: Amberton Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Amberton Lane, just west of the Temple of Kurtulmak.
Room.LongDescription: Kurtulmak is the chief diety of the kobold clans that inhabit the sewers beneath Oceancrest. He hates just about everyone else except kobolds in the world and seeks the day that his kobold followers can take over the surface world from the hideous humaniod creatures.
